pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.21.0, World Mana Rework!$(li)World Mana is renamed to Source.$(li)Removes passive source from Volcanic Sourcelink$(li)Volcanic Sourcelink now has new production behaviors.$(li)Mana Condenser -> Agronomic Sourcelink $(li)Mob death/birth has been moved from the mana condenser to the Vitalic Sourcelink$(li)Mana Bloom -> Magebloom

$(li)Adds three new Source generators!$(li)Adds two new source relays!$(li)Mana Gem -> Source Gem$(li)Adds two new Source Berry foods$(li)Adds six new gilded arcane blocks$(li)Place Block and Phantom Block now replace liquid or grass.$(li)Glyphs cost less Source$(li)Relays and Sourcelinks have new models$(li)Adds tags for the Slyph and Ritual of Disintegration
